And<S>2532</S> he entered<S>1525</S> again<S>3825</S> into<S>1519</S> the synagogue<S>4864</S>; and<S>2532</S> there was<S>2258</S> a man<S>444</S> there<S>1563</S> which had<S>2192</S> a withered<S>3583</S> hand<S>5495</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they watched<S>3906</S> him<S>846</S>, whether<S>1487</S> he would heal<S>2323</S> him<S>846</S> on the sabbath day<S>4521</S>; that<S>2443</S> they might accuse<S>2723</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto the man<S>444</S> which had<S>2192</S> the withered<S>3583</S> hand<S>5495</S>, Stand<S>1453</S> forth<S>1519</S> <S>3319</S>. <sup>Stand forth: Gr. Arise, stand forth in the midst</sup>
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Is it lawful<S>1832</S> to do good<S>15</S> on the sabbath days<S>4521</S>, or<S>2228</S> to do evil<S>2554</S>? to save<S>4982</S> life<S>5590</S>, or<S>2228</S> to kill<S>615</S>? But<S>1161</S> they held their peace<S>4623</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he had looked round about<S>4017</S> on them<S>846</S> with<S>3326</S> anger<S>3709</S>, being grieved<S>4818</S> for<S>1909</S> the hardness<S>4457</S> of their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S>, he saith<S>3004</S> unto the man<S>444</S>, Stretch forth<S>1614</S> thine<S>4675</S> hand<S>5495</S>. And<S>2532</S> he stretched it out<S>1614</S>: and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S> was restored<S>600</S> whole<S>5199</S> as<S>5613</S> the other<S>243</S>.hardness: or, blindness
And<S>2532</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> went forth<S>1831</S>, and straightway<S>2112</S> took<S>4160</S> counsel<S>4824</S> with<S>3326</S> the Herodians<S>2265</S> against<S>2596</S> him<S>846</S>, how<S>3704</S> they might destroy<S>622</S> him<S>846</S>.
But<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> withdrew himself<S>402</S> with<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> to<S>4314</S> the sea<S>2281</S>: and<S>2532</S> a great<S>4183</S> multitude<S>4128</S> from<S>575</S> Galilee<S>1056</S> followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> Judaea<S>2449</S>,
And<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> Idumaea<S>2401</S>, and<S>2532</S> from beyond<S>4008</S> Jordan<S>2446</S>; and<S>2532</S> they about<S>4012</S> Tyre<S>5184</S> and<S>2532</S> Sidon<S>4605</S>, a great<S>4183</S> multitude<S>4128</S>, when they had heard<S>191</S> what great things<S>3745</S> he did<S>4160</S>, came<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he spake<S>2036</S> to his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, that<S>2443</S> a small ship<S>4142</S> should wait on<S>4342</S> him<S>846</S> because<S>1223</S> of the multitude<S>3793</S>, lest<S>3363</S> they should throng<S>2346</S> him<S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he had healed<S>2323</S> many<S>4183</S>; insomuch that<S>5620</S> they pressed upon<S>1968</S> him<S>846</S> for to<S>2443</S> touch<S>680</S> him<S>846</S>, as many as<S>3745</S> had<S>2192</S> plagues<S>3148</S>. <sup>pressed: or, rushed</sup>
And<S>2532</S> unclean<S>169</S> spirits<S>4151</S>, when<S>3752</S> they saw<S>2334</S> him<S>846</S>, fell down before<S>4363</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> cried<S>2896</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> Thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he straitly<S>4183</S> charged<S>2008</S> them<S>846</S> that<S>3363</S> they should<S>4160</S> not<S>3363</S> make<S>4160</S> him<S>846</S> known<S>5318</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he goeth up<S>305</S> into<S>1519</S> a mountain<S>3735</S>, and<S>2532</S> calleth<S>4341</S> unto him whom<S>3739</S> he<S>846</S> would<S>2309</S>: and<S>2532</S> they came<S>565</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he ordained<S>4160</S> twelve<S>1427</S>, that<S>2443</S> they should be<S>5600</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> he might send<S>649</S> them<S>846</S> forth<S>649</S> to preach<S>2784</S>,
And<S>2532</S> to have<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S> to heal<S>2323</S> sicknesses<S>3554</S>, and<S>2532</S> to cast out<S>1544</S> devils<S>1140</S>:
And<S>2532</S> Simon<S>4613</S> he surnamed<S>2007</S> <S>3686</S> Peter<S>4074</S>;
And<S>2532</S> James<S>2385</S> the son <S>3588</S> of Zebedee<S>2199</S>, and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S> the brother<S>80</S> of James<S>2385</S>; and<S>2532</S> he surnamed<S>2007</S> <S>3686</S> them<S>846</S> Boanerges<S>993</S>, which is<S>3603</S>, The sons<S>5207</S> of thunder<S>1027</S>:
And<S>2532</S> Andrew<S>406</S>, and<S>2532</S> Philip<S>5376</S>, and<S>2532</S> Bartholomew<S>918</S>, and<S>2532</S> Matthew<S>3156</S>, and<S>2532</S> Thomas<S>2381</S>, and<S>2532</S> James<S>2385</S> the son <S>3588</S> of Alphaeus<S>256</S>, and<S>2532</S> Thaddaeus<S>2280</S>, and<S>2532</S> Simon<S>4613</S> the Canaanite<S>2581</S>,
And<S>2532</S> Judas<S>2455</S> Iscariot<S>2469</S>, which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> betrayed<S>3860</S> him<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> they went<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> an house<S>3624</S>. <sup>into: or, home</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> cometh together<S>4905</S> again<S>3825</S>, so that<S>5620</S> they<S>846</S> could<S>1410</S> not<S>3361</S> so much as<S>3383</S> eat<S>5315</S> bread<S>740</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when his<S>846</S> friends<S>3844</S> heard<S>191</S> of it, they went out<S>1831</S> to lay hold<S>2902</S> on him<S>846</S>: for<S>1063</S> they said<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> He is beside himself<S>1839</S>. <sup>friends: or, kinsmen</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the scribes<S>1122</S> which<S>3588</S> came down<S>2597</S> from<S>575</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> said<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> He hath<S>2192</S> Beelzebub<S>954</S>,<S>3754</S> and<S>2532</S> by<S>1722</S> the prince<S>758</S> of the devils<S>1140</S> casteth he out<S>1544</S> devils<S>1140</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he called<S>4341</S> them<S>846</S> unto him, and said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> parables<S>3850</S>, How<S>4459</S> can<S>1410</S> Satan<S>4567</S> cast out<S>1544</S> Satan<S>4567</S>?
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> a kingdom<S>932</S> be divided<S>3307</S> against<S>1909</S> itself<S>1438</S>, that<S>1565</S> kingdom<S>932</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> stand<S>2476</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> a house<S>3614</S> be divided<S>3307</S> against<S>1909</S> itself<S>1438</S>, that<S>1565</S> house<S>3614</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> stand<S>2476</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1487</S> Satan<S>4567</S> rise up<S>450</S> against<S>1909</S> himself<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> be divided<S>3307</S>, he cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> stand<S>2476</S>, but<S>235</S> hath<S>2192</S> an end<S>5056</S>.
No man<S>3762</S> can<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> a strong man's<S>2478</S> house<S>3614</S>, and spoil<S>1283</S> his<S>846</S> goods<S>4632</S>, except<S>3362</S> he will<S>1210</S> first<S>4412</S> bind<S>1210</S> the strong man<S>2478</S>; and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> he will spoil<S>1283</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S>.
Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> All<S>3956</S> sins<S>265</S> shall be forgiven<S>863</S> unto the sons<S>5207</S> of men<S>444</S>, and<S>2532</S> blasphemies<S>988</S> wherewith<S>3745</S> soever<S>302</S> they shall blaspheme<S>987</S>:
But<S>1161</S> he<S>3739</S> that<S>302</S> shall blaspheme<S>987</S> against<S>1519</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> hath<S>2192</S> never<S>3756</S> <S>1519</S> <S>165</S> forgiveness<S>859</S>, but<S>235</S> is<S>2076</S> in danger<S>1777</S> of eternal<S>166</S> damnation<S>2920</S>:
Because<S>3754</S> they said<S>3004</S>, He hath<S>2192</S> an unclean<S>169</S> spirit<S>4151</S>.
There came<S>2064</S> then<S>3767</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S> and<S>2532</S> his mother<S>3384</S>, and<S>2532</S>, standing<S>2476</S> without<S>1854</S>, sent<S>649</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, calling<S>5455</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> sat<S>2521</S> about<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, thy<S>4675</S> mother<S>3384</S> and<S>2532</S> thy<S>4675</S> brethren<S>80</S> without<S>1854</S> seek for<S>2212</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Who<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> mother<S>3384</S>, or<S>2228</S> my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he looked<S>4017</S> round about<S>2945</S> on them which<S>3588</S> sat<S>2521</S> about<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S>, and said<S>3004</S>, Behold<S>2396</S> my<S>3450</S> mother<S>3384</S> and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>!
For<S>1063</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall do<S>4160</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>, the same<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> brother<S>80</S>, and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> sister<S>79</S>, and<S>2532</S> mother<S>3384</S>.
